strings.v: Unlock by completing the preceding quest.
They are short objectives which reveal hidden quests for a limited time. Once they disappear, they must be rediscovered.
The Person who discovers a Bounty Mission is the Initiator. The Initiator receives additional rewards if the objective listed in the Bounty Mission info page is met.
Each member of the Initiator's Alliance can participate in the Bounty Mission while it is available, however each participant can only contribute once to each Bounty Mission.
Certain Bounty Missions may award additional rewards to everyone who contributes, if the objective listed in the Bounty Mission info page is met.
Bounty Missions can be discovered by you or your Alliance members.
Each Bounty Mission has a list of modes in The Contest where it can be discovered.
Bounty Missions contain rare prizes. Be sure to discover and participate in Bounty Missions to maximize your rewards!
Brackets are updated after the event ends.
You have [4bb4fe]{0}[-] to complete the Quest before it closes! If you exit or time runs out, you will be required to pay the activation cost again.
You've used up all the Entries, Wait for the Entry timer to reset and you can play the Quests again.
You've used up all the Entries, Wait for the Entry timer to reset and you can play the Quests again.
Quest entries are limited in this event! Wait for the entry timer to reset if you've used up all your entries.
Champions in your team are now being used in a Story or Event Quest.
Your exit will be selected randomly.
This portal exits primarily to [23A3FEFF]{0}[-], with a rare chance to exit to other destinations.
This Portal's exit is selected randomly, with some destinations more common than others.
This portal exits to one of several optional destinations.
This Portal has an equal chance to teleport to one of several exits.
This portal exits to a single defined destination.
This portal's exit is unpredictable. Enter at your own risk!
When a Summoner is on an active portal, the entrance and potential exits will be highlighted.
For Portals with Direct or Multiple exits, you can also teleport by tapping directly on the Exit Node on the Quest Map.
[FFFFFF]Direct:[-] exits to a single defined destination.
[FFFFFF]Multiple:[-] exits to one of several optional destinations.
[FFFFFF]Random:[-] exits to one of several randomly-selected destinations.
[FFFFFF]Fluctuating:[-] exits to a randomly-selected destination, but will favor one over the others.
[FFFFFF]Random:[-] exits to one of several destinations. Some portals have an equal chance to teleport to one of several exits, while others feature rare destinations.
[3E9CDF]BLUE[-] labels indicate nodes where portals can be summoned and entered.
[D0021B]RED[-] labels indicate nodes where portals exit.
Portals teleport Summoners from one node to another, to otherwise unreachable destinations of the Battlerealm!
Go to a Portal node to summon it. A menu will open and youâ€™ll be prompted to teleport.
Portals currently have three types of exits: Direct, Multiple, and Random.
Tap on a Portals Entrance Label to learn more about it's behavior, and preview it's destination.
Portal {0} has been summoned on this node.
This Portal is ready for teleportation.
You need to select an exit.
You will be teleported to the selected destination.
COMPLETE QUEST WITHIN THE GIVEN TIME

If you end the quest, your quest progress
will be lost and you won't keep the 
collected ISO-8 or Chests.
Entry fee is required to re-enter this Quest.
Quest entries are limited in this event! If you end the quest, your entry will be used and your quest progress will be lost along with any rewards you have earned.
THE QUEST IS NOW CLOSED. YOUR PROGRESS HAS BEEN RESET.
You can re-enter the quest again when you are eligible.

You will be locked to the chosen difficulty until the Quest is completed or closed. Upon entry, the Quest must be completed within the specified time period.

[ff390dff][-]The start cost will need to be repaid if you leave or time out.[-]
TIMER STARTS AS SOON AS YOU ENTER THE QUEST MAP!
These are the enemies you find on the quest.
You must meet all requirements to start the Quest.
There are no active Quests at this time. Please check back later.

You have unopened crystals.
Would you like to open them now?

You have unused Upgrade Item available.
Would you like to upgrade your Champions now?
Rewards are given out when completing a quest.
You need a {0} Champion in your party to pass.
You need {0} in your party to pass.
{0} Champions cannot pass through this gate.
You don't meet the requirements to open this gate.
If you end the quest before completion, your progress will be lost, but any items spent to open gates will be refunded.
Any items spent to open gates will be refunded to your inventory.

You are about to spend a resource to open this gate.

If you quit the Quest or run out of time prior to completing it, your progress will be reset, but any spent resources will be fully refunded.
Gate cost must be paid upon every entry.

You are about to spend a resource to open this gate.

If you quit the Quest or run out of time prior to completing it, your progress will be reset, but any spent resources will be fully refunded.
Complete the quest to receive these items!
Continue your quest to collect chests and rewards.
Modok's Boost Manipulator is only available in his experimental battleground.  Use it now to try and gain an advantage over the enemy!
Not all random boosts will benefit your opponent as their own abilities may counteract a boost's effects!
Modok's Buff Manipulator is only available in his experimental battleground.  Use it now to try and gain an advantage over the enemy!
M.O.D.O.K.'s Buff Randomizer is only available in his experimental battleground.  Use it now to try and gain an advantage over the enemy!
Not all random buffs will benefit your opponent as their own abilities may counteract a buff's effects!
You can reroll these boosts before you start the fight!
The Buff Randomizer item is only available in this quest. Use it now to try and gain an advantage over the enemy!
This random buff is locked and can not be rerolled.
You can reroll these buffs before you start the fight!
Enemy buffs are completely randomized in this event only!
Only Champions which fulfill certain requirements can be used.
TAP ON AN ITEM TO USE IT OR TO GET MORE!
Tap on each chest to claim the reward inside!
This milestone was awarded to you while you were a member of a different alliance.
You cannot claim this milestone because you did not contribute towards it or because you didn't join your alliance in time.
You need to be in an Alliance to trigger this Bounty Mission.
This Bounty Mission has ended. Trigger it again!
At the end of the Bounty Mission, the Alliance Member who initiated this Bounty Mission will receive a bonus reward based on the number of members completed.
To participate, you need to be in the Alliance before the Bounty Mission is discovered. Join the next available Bounty Mission!
Initiator who discovered this Bounty Mission:
You have discovered a Bounty Mission!
An Alliance Member has discovered a Bounty Mission!
As the Initiator who discovered this Bounty Mission, you will get additional bonus rewards based on your Alliance's participation!
Earn rewards in your Alliance Bounty Mission! Help your Initiator earn bonus rewards!
AN ALLIANCE MEMBER HAS DISCOVERED A BOUNTY MISSION!
This is a limited event that will disappear once the timer ends. It must be discovered again by you or your Alliance members.

Multiple Bounty Missions discovered!
Tap to view info.

Multiple Bounty Missions discovered!
View All to get more information.
MULTIPLE BOUNTY MISSIONS HAVE BEEN DISCOVERED!
[B0B0B0FF]An Alliance Member has discovered a Bounty Mission![-]
This Bounty Mission cannot be discovered again until it has ended.
Unclaimed rewards go to your Stash
You can also use Valor to buy various items in the Store. Spending this Valor will not affect your Valor Leaderboard score!
Collecting Valor may also trigger a Test of Valor for you and your Alliance to participate in!
The higher the amount of Valor collected, the higher your chance of triggering a Test of Valor!
The Alliance member who discovers the Test of Valor will get additional rewards if the required number of Alliance members participate.
Once a Test of Valor is triggered, a new Test of Valor cannot be triggered until the first one has ended.
Earning Valor in Tests of Valor cannot trigger a new Test of Valor!
At the end of the event, rare rewards will be given to the top Summoner!
Spending Valor here will not affect your Valor Leaderboard placement.
Welcome to the Test of Valor! This event will test your skills in battle and award you with Valor!
Your total lifetime Valor earned will determine your placement in the Test of Valor Leaderboard.
Earn Valor by participating in various areas during the event.
Compete and aim for the top of the Valor Leaderboard.
This unique store is set up to allow you to purchase valuable items.
There are multiple places you can earn Valor while they are available.
